"Broken button" is an extension designed for developers and web designers to easily identify potential issues with long text that may cause HTML elements to break or overflow.

With this handy tool, you can quickly analyze and validate how various HTML elements such as buttons, titles, labels, and other user interface components handle long text content. By simulating different text lengths, you can ensure that your web pages or applications remain visually appealing and functional across different devices and screen sizes.

Enhance your development workflow and create visually stunning web experiences with the "Broken button" Chrome extension. Ensure that your HTML elements gracefully adapt to different text lengths, resulting in improved usability and user satisfaction.
